column2: It has been a year and you STILL do not have a liege! Please §YMove§! to a new location by clicking on one of the province §YHoldings§! and §YRight Clicking§! on the §YBarony§! Coat of Arms!
You can §YMove§! to a new location by clicking on one of the province §YHoldings§! and §YRight Clicking§! on the §YBarony§! Coat of Arms!
You can only visit the §YWeaponsmith§! and the §YArmorsmith§! if you do not already have all of the associated slots filled!
§YTrade Goods§! can be purchased and sold at the §YMarketplace§!. The §YTooltip§! will tell you what the §YTrade Good§! is worth!
You can §YBuild Workshop§! in a §YProvince§! that does not have a §YTrade Goods§! modifier by §YRight Clicking§! on the §YCounty§! Coat of Arms.
You can §YPreach Religion§! in a §YProvince§! that does not share your own §YReligion§! by §YRight Clicking§! on the §YCounty§! Coat of Arms.
You can §YRecruit Volunteers§! in a §YProvince§! by §YRight Clicking§! on the §YCounty§! Coat of Arms.
You can §YRecruit Patriots§! in a §YProvince§! that shares your §YCulture§!, but not your top liege's, by §YRight Clicking§! on the §YCounty§! Coat of Arms.
You can §YRecruit Patriots§! in a §YProvince§! that shares your §YReligion§!, but not your top liege's, by §YRight Clicking§! on the §YCounty§! Coat of Arms.
Characters with the §YMercenary§! government automatically receive a random amount of §YTroops§! each year.
People with the §YPrivateer§! government can attack neutral §YShips§! for wealth and prisoners.
Did you know that completing 4 §YArena§! matches grants you the §YGladiator§! trait?
Did you know that completing 5 §YMilitary Campaigns§! grants you the §YAdventurer§! trait?
Did you know that completing 2 §YHoly War Campaigns§! grants you your §YReligion's§! §YHoly Warrior§! trait?
Did you know that §YMercenaries§! and §YHoly Orders§! cannot purchase a §YHouse§! or §YManor§!?
Did you know that §YNaval Battles§! can grant you the §YAdmiral§! and §YNaval Expert§! traits?
Did you know that there are new §YTerrain Defensive Bonuses§!?
Did you know that you can continue playing as a §YNon-Dynastic Heir§!?
